Home → Recommendations & reviews → Reviews → The Ladybird Book of the Meeting, by Jason Hazeley & Joel Morris

The Ladybird Book of the Meeting, by Jason Hazeley & Joel Morris

Written by Alison Wheeler · Published Dec 24, 2016

Every day until Christmas Eve, a member of Suffolk Libraries staff will reveal a book, CD or DVD they will be giving as a Christmas present, and why. On our final day, chief executive officer Alison Wheeler recommends The Ladybird Book of the Meeting, by Jason Hazeley & Joel Morris.

I’m giving lots of these to people for Christmas:

“This delightful book is the latest in the series of Ladybird books which have been specially planned to help grown-ups with the world about them.

“The large clear script, the careful choice of words, the frequent repetition and the thoughtful matching of text with pictures all enable grown-ups to think they have taught themselves to cope. Featuring original Ladybird artwork alongside brilliantly funny, brand new text.”

This is one of our advent calendar suggestions for 2016. See the whole calendar →

Alison Wheeler

I worked in Suffolk's library service from 1979 to 2018. I was a children's librarian, stock librarian, worked in the Schools Library Service, ran branches, helped introduce our Sunday service and was chief executive officer from 2012 to 2018.
